text: athava tamara mate ko'i sonanum ghara bani jaya, athava tame akasa para cadhi batavo, ane ame to tamarum cadhi javum pana te samaya sudhi kyareya nahim mani'e, jyam sudhi ke tame amara mate ko'i kitaba na la'i avo, jene ame pote padhi la'i'e, tame javaba api do ke maro palanahara pavitra che, hum to phakta eka manusya ja chum, jene payagambara banavavamam avyo che
